info.title: Navigate backwards to a grid in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusAfterGrid
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link after the grid
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on a link after the grid
testPageDocument.querySelector('#afterlink').focus();

user: Navigate to the first column header in the grid.
instructions.raw: Navigate to the first column header in the grid.
instructions.mode: Verify the Virtual Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, exit Forms Mode to activate the Virtual Cursor by pressing Escape.

assertions.expectation: Name 'Transactions January 1 through January 6' is conveyed
Text of the first column header ('Date') is conveyed
Coordinates of the column header (column 1, row 1) are conveyed
